title: Vi
body:
Can someone please explain how this is "balanced"

Has unstoppable ult
Can build tank without sacrificing damage
Constant armour shred with attack speed buff that also deals % hp damage
Longest gap closer in game
AoE abilities for faster clear times and better team fighting

Perhaps the dumbest kit riot ever cooked up imho

replies.body:
Has unstoppable ult = Can be stop actually: Thresh E (must be timed perfectly)
Can build tank without sacrificing damage = Well then build thornmail?????
Constant armour shred with attack speed = Everything scales???????

Not your crappiest champ, because you got to think about how the people build Vi
Plus you gank Vi early game, she's mushy during early game (check jgl, invade)

Not everyone is hard to kill. Seriously
It's balanced when the team vsing her has players that understand spacing and focusing :)

Needs team to follow up on ult
Needs some damage e.g. Trinity Force + Jungle item
True, but you need to stick to the target - easily peeled
Again, need team to follow up or you're toast
AOE does no damage, only good as an AA reset

She's strong, but not unbalanced compared to people like Katarina.

she's not, that's how.
she's not the worst, when champs like liss, gnar, thresh exist, but she's up there.
